alert.note: Alert for Camden; Dallas; Greene; Hickory; Polk; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hickory, northwestern Webster, Dallas, eastern Polk, northeastern Greene and southwestern Camden Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hermitage to near Buffalo to near Pleasant Hope. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pomme de Terre Lake... Pomme De Terre State Park... Bennett Spring State Park... Marshfield... Buffalo... Fair Grove... Pittsburg... Conway... Polk... Pleasant Hope... Hermitage... Urbana... Macks Creek... Preston... Cross Timbers... Halfway... Bennett Springs... Louisburg... Windyville... Elkland... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 100 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Dallas; Greene; Hickory; Polk; Webster
